[In the Shadows of Toil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1731)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Crown of the Kobold King</spoilers>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 116</row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_In the Shadows of Toil_ was originally an incomplete copy of a journal kept by the dwarven adventurer Druingar the Glintaxe. Drazmorg made extensive use of the book's wide margins and several dozen blank pages left in the back to serve as a spellbook. Over the years, he further enhanced his copy to transform it into a grimoire (see [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=1494) full rules on grimoires). A character who reads [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) can learn about Drazmorg's history, his discovery of the Third Seal, and his hopes to absorb all of its power before seeking out the [Whispering Way](/Deities.aspx?ID=24) to lead them on a new crusade to hunt down the next two seals, destroy them, and bring back the Whispering Tyrant. Beyond these frightening notes, the grimoire also contains copies of all the spells Drazmorg has prepared and those needed to recharge [his staff](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1728); feel free to add more spells to this list if you wish.
